scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package -- $1; npm run cc:install $1 $2; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package -- $1; hurl upgrade ${3:-$1} node $2  -P ./chaincode-$1; }; f
scripts.cc:start:debug: f() { npm run cc:package -- $1; npm run cc:install:debug $1 $2; }; f
scripts.server:rest-api: f() { npx lerna bootstrap; npx lerna run start --scope server --stream; }; f
scripts.server:refresh-api: f() { npx lerna bootstrap; npm run cc:upgrade -- $1 $2; npx lerna run start --scope server --stream; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --update --config ./$1.config.json --output ./chaincode-$1 package; }; f
